>> users/deployment.yaml
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: users
spec:
  replicas: 3

>> orders/deployment.yaml
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: orders
spec:
  replicas: 5

>> payments/deployment.yaml
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: payments
spec:
  replicas: 2
